content.raw:
That looks good. Although we could still pass the `_msg` object along to local non-raw subscribers before quitting if it fails to serialize.

It seems that serialization failure can occur if a "required" field is missing, so it's not impossible. I guess the question is whether we want to support passing along messages with missing required fields, but only to local subscribers.
